posts.message:
Greetings!

This a last and final call to join Dubai Smart City App Hack competition.  The application closing date is September 20th. The submissions will be judged during the period September 23rd to October 3rd.  Ten shortlisted applications will be announced on 6th October and invited to pitch at GITEX on 20 October.  The winning team will win all paid trip to Barcelona and a slot to pitch at the Smart City Word Expo 17-19 November.

Steps to submit your final app?
1. Join the Appcircus community by creating a user account.
2. Create a public profile of your app. Remember it is important to have a clear and concise description.
3. Submit at least 3 cool screenshots and a demo video showing your app in action (especially if your app is not yet available at a store). This is where the judges will base their score so do your best!
4. Once you have the app profile ready, you can submit it at the Dubai SCAH Online Competition

Who can participate?
Anyone (a startup or an existing early stage company) with a finished app on the theme of one of the 5 areas of the Dubai Smart City App Hack are eligible to join. For more information regarding prizes, rules, T&Cs please visit our updated website at dubai.smartcityapphack.com

Feel free to email/inbox me for any clarifications...

Have a great day!
Mohamed Abdeljalil

السلام  عليكم.... 
انا شغال ف بروجكت بال MVC و بستخدم MVC.Grid عشان اعرض الداتا المشكله ان ال Photo الخاصه بال Employee مش بتظهر بتظهرلي String 
ممكن اعرف ازاي اقدر اخليها  تظهر Image في Grid 
ولا هو اصلا مينفعش عشان اناا عملت سيرش عليها و مش لاقي حل ليها 
دول Captures  للكود و لما بتظهر ع ال Browser
